Template (Nunjucks) for rendering every synced Kindle note highlights.

Available variables to use

Book
  • {{title}} - Title (shortened)
  • {{fullTitle}} - Title (full)
  • {{author}} - Author
  • {{asin}} - Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN)
  • {{url}} - Book Url on Amazon
  • {{imageUrl}} - Cover image
  • {{appLink}} - Link to book in local Kindle app
  • {{highlights}} - List of your Kindle highlights for this book
Book metadata (Amazon sync only)
  • {{isbn}} - ISBN
  • {{pages}} - Print length
  • {{publication}} - Publication date
  • {{publisher}} - Publisher
  • {{authorUrl}} - Author Url on Amazon
Highlight
  • {{text}} - Text
  • {{color}} - Highlight color
  • {{location}} - Location in book
  • {{page}} - Page location in book
  • {{note}} - Associated note
  • {{appLink}} - Link to highlighted text in local Kindle app
